name: Hotel Bergschloessl

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bergschlossl is a classic Inn in the perfect location in St Anton, a mecca for skiing in the Arlberg. You couldn't be closer to the action for it is located steps away from the lift and the pedestrian zone with many shops and restaurants. But........ while being in the center of it all, you would have no idea as it is calm and quiet inside.
reviews.title: Absolutely THE #1 place to stay in St Anton!!!!!

reviews.text: We had a mixup with our reservation but the owners graciously understood our predicament. They not only accommodated us but gave us a wonderful upgrade to an immense suite.
reviews.title: Summer holidays: avoid it before July !

reviews.text: The attention to detail in the restoration of this historic, family owned building is evident. The character of the original architecture is maintained while every modern day convenience was considered. Each room/suite is different. Beautiful, clean, modern fixtures and bathrooms, very comfortable beds, linens and towels. The floors are heated and although we were unable to find a thermostat in the room, we were more comfortable temperature-wise than any other hotel we stayed in in the Alps. Double pane windows keep out the outside noise and no sound can be heard from neighboring rooms. The wifi signal is strong throughout.
reviews.title: Calm, quiet, traditional hotel in great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff is quiet and reserved but helpful when asked. Breakfast choices are plentiful and the offerings are substantial and fresh. You can ski right up to the ski room or right down to the gondola! The garage for the car is an added plus!
reviews.title: Classic, elegant, romantic, 10m from lift

reviews.text: We had a truly special stay and cannot recommend Bergschlossl more highly. We hope to return to explore the hiking in the area in the summer. Must be spectacular!
reviews.title: Great location - not very welcoming service

aka: Hotel Bergschloessl Austria/St. Anton Am Arlberg
description: Skihotel Bergschlössl best location in St. Anton am Arlberg directly next to the skilifts, to the ski resorts, 280 km of slopes, tastefully decorated.
